rules_text:
If a creature you control dies, exile it. Then return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
If a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses life equal to that creatures toughness.
flavor_text: [i]“I do not believe in immortality, but my time can be set to what I desire” - Auxious, Traitor of Certhin[/i]
